A network error occurred, check your network connection and try to reload.
It might have been moved, renamed or deleted. Or you might not be allowed to load this document.

The information presented below is intended for developers of this editor to triage the error. 
Please include this when contacting your support team for further assistance.
{TOTAL_DOCUMENTS, plural, one{# document} other{# documents}} loaded so far…
SDK: {SDK_VERSION}, generated on {DATE, fonto_date}, {DATE, time, short}
Fonto was unable to update the interface due to an unexpected error.
Fonto was unable to complete your action due to an unexpected error.
Fonto was unable to save your documents due to an unexpected error.
Fonto was unable to load your content due to an unexpected error.
We’re sorry. Please contact your support team for further assistance so we can try to get things back on track as quickly as possible.

It may be possible to continue normally. If Fonto starts behaving oddly, try restarting Fonto. If the issue persists, please contact your support team for assistance so we can try to get things back on track as quickly as possible.
This document was edited somewhere else
You can refresh this document to get its latest version, but refreshing it will discard all your unsaved changes. If you want to keep your changes, you can:
Paste your content back into the refreshed document
Refresh this document to get the latest version and start editing.
This document could not be locked
The CMS returned an error when attempting to lock this document. Please check your connection and retry.
The lock for this document could not be released
The CMS returned an error when attempting to release the lock for this document. Please check your connection and retry releasing the lock, or refresh the document if the error persists.
Only you can edit this document
If you're done editing this document, you can release the lock so others can edit it.
You can't edit this document. It is possibly being edited by someone else, or you don't have the required access rights.
You can refresh the document to see the latest version.
This document could not be saved
Fonto is having trouble saving this document. Please check your network connection. We'll keep trying.
You can refresh this document, but refreshing it will discard all your unsaved changes. If you want to keep your changes, you can:
We have been unable to save your documents for {HOURS, plural, =0{{MINUTES, plural, =0{} other{#m }}} other{#h {MINUTES}m }}{SECONDS}s
This may be caused by problems with your network connection, or the CMS may not be responding correctly.
You may continue anyway, however, your changes will not be saved until the problem is resolved.
FontoXML can’t run in this browser
Please use FontoXML with the latest version of a browser from the list below. If you don’t have these installed on your computer, you can go to the browser’s download page by clicking it.

A browser is a program on your computer that you can use to access the internet. Well-known examples are Internet Explorer, Chrome and Firefox. If you have a browser installed, you can open it on your computer like any other software.
How to download a new browser
You can download a browser by clicking one in the list above. This will bring you to that browser’s website, where you can download the latest version.
Instructions on how to update your browser can be found on the website of that browser. Please keep in mind that company computers may require support from the IT department to update a browser.
Why can’t I use this browser?
We make use of the latest web technologies so FontoXML can work as reliable and as fast as possible. These technologies are only available in the latest versions of the browsers in the list above.
FontoXML can’t run on this device
Please open FontoXML on a laptop or desktop computer.
Why can’t I use this device?
FontoXML requires a desktop grade processor to work as reliable and as fast as possible. Also, we don’t support touch screens and virtual keyboards yet.
